title: The sign that appears on 41st street and Shipyard Blvd. states that this project is a 5 year investment. Is the DOT saying it will take them 5 years to complete this project? So far,all that meets my eyes is, they have cut down some trees and patched a few holes .
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/a-sign-on-41st-street-and-shipyard-boulevard-says-the-project-is-a-5-year-investment-does-that-mean-theyll-be-working-there-for-five-years/
